Decentralized Science Funding Network

Zoo Labs Foundation is pioneering decentralized funding mechanisms for breakthrough research. Our network of specialized DAOs enables global communities to fund, govern, and benefit from cutting-edge scientific discoveries.

Research Focus Areas

Key domains where our DAOs are making breakthrough discoveries

BrainDAO - AI Research

Neural networks, AGI safety, interpretability research, and open-source language models.

Learn more →

GreenDAO - Climate Solutions

Carbon capture, renewable energy, atmospheric engineering, and ecosystem restoration.

Learn more →

HealthDAO - Longevity Research

Aging mechanisms, regenerative medicine, personalized therapeutics, and healthspan extension.

Learn more →

SpaceDAO - Space Technology

Satellite networks, asteroid mining, life support systems, and interplanetary infrastructure.

Learn more →

NanoDAO - Nanotechnology

Molecular machines, drug delivery systems, materials science, and quantum computing.

Learn more →

OceanDAO - Marine Research

Ocean acidification, marine biodiversity, sustainable fisheries, and deep sea exploration.

Learn more →

Project Roadmap

Our vision for decentralized science funding

Phase 1 - Launch
DAO Infrastructure
Deploy core DAO contracts, launch KEEPER token, establish initial governance framework
Phase 2 - Expansion
Multi-DAO Network
Launch specialized DAOs, cross-chain integration, milestone-based funding mechanisms
Phase 3 - Scale
Global Research Network
Institutional partnerships, IP-NFT framework, decentralized peer review system
Phase 4 - Impact
Real-World Outcomes
First commercialized research, revenue sharing, sustainable funding ecosystem

Value Capture Model

How the ecosystem creates and distributes value

💰
IP Monetization
Research outputs are tokenized as IP-NFTs, with revenue flowing back to DAOs and contributors
🏆
Success Rewards
Milestone-based payments ensure accountability and reward successful research outcomes
🌐
Network Effects
Growing ecosystem attracts top talent, increasing success rates and token value
